shri lanka ganum kalamanakaruwange darshakaya - 2019 agosthu 2019 juli masaye di uddhamanaya ihalata shri lanka maha bankuwe adhipathi aacharya indrajith kumaraswami deshamanya sammanayen pidum labayi shri lanka ganum kalamanakaruwange darshakaya - 2019 juli prathamika alewikaruweku matha ganu labana niyamana kriyamargaya - pan eeshiya bankin kopareshan pielsi liyapadinchi skandha ha surakumpath aagnyapanatha ha deshiya bhandagara bilpath aagnyapanatha yatathe nikuth karana lada niyogayanta anuwa, shri lanka maha bankuwa wisin karanu labana wimarshana katayuthu thawaduratath sidu karagena yame aramunin, shri lanka maha bankuwe mudal mandalaya wisin pan eeshiya bankin kopareshan pielsi, prathamika alewikaruweku lesa karanu labana wyapara katayuthu saha kriyakarakam 2019 agosthu masa 15 wani dina pe.wa. 10.00 sita balapawathwena paridi masa hayaka (06) kalasimawak sandaha thawaduratath athhituwimata thiranaya karana ladi.
